body:
I am trying to compile bitcoin core using this following configure command.
`CC=afl-clang-lto CXX=afl-clang-lto++ AR=llvm-ar-11 RANLIB=llvm-ranlib-11 EVENT_PTHREADS_CFLAGS='-I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu' EVENT_PTHREADS_LIBS='-L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -levent' EVENT_CFLAGS='-I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu' EVENT_LIBS='-L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -levent' LDFLAGS='-L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -latomic -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -levent_core -levent' CFLAGS='-L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ -DBOOST_NO_CXX11_SCOPED_ENUMS -O1 -g' CXXFLAGS='-I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -DBOOST_NO_CXX11_SCOPED_ENUMS -O1 -g' ./configure --disable-hardening --enable-util-cli --enable-util-tx --enable-util-wallet --with-libmultiprocess=no  --with-incompatible-bdb --with-boost-libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu`

When I compile, I receive this error.
```
ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::detail::directory_iterator_construct(boost::filesystem::directory_iterator&, boost::filesystem::path const&, unsigned int, boost::system::error_code*)
>>> referenced by directory.hpp:278 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/directory.hpp:278)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::directory_iterator::directory_iterator(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::directory_options::enum_type))
>>> did you mean: boost::filesystem::detail::directory_iterator_construct(boost::filesystem::directory_iterator&, boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::system::error_code*)
>>> defined in: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::directory_entry::get_status(boost::system::error_code*) const
>>> referenced by directory.hpp:132 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/directory.hpp:132)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::directory_entry::status() const)

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: evthread_use_pthreads
>>> referenced by httpserver.cpp:376
>>>               lto.tmp:(InitHTTPServer())
>>> referenced by torcontrol.cpp:753
>>>               lto.tmp:(StartTorControl(CService))

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::detail::absolute(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::system::error_code*)
>>> referenced by operations.hpp:258 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/operations.hpp:258)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::absolute(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::path const&))

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::detail::copy_file(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::path const&, unsigned int, boost::system::error_code*)
>>> referenced by operations.hpp:355 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/operations.hpp:355)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::copy_file(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::copy_option::enum_type))

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::detail::recursive_directory_iterator_construct(boost::filesystem::recursive_directory_iterator&, boost::filesystem::path const&, unsigned int, boost::system::error_code*)
>>> referenced by directory.hpp:456 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/directory.hpp:456)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::recursive_directory_iterator::recursive_directory_iterator(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::system::error_code&))

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::directory_entry::get_symlink_status(boost::system::error_code*) const
>>> referenced by directory.hpp:134 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/directory.hpp:134)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::directory_entry::symlink_status() const)

ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: boost::filesystem::detail::recursive_directory_iterator_increment(boost::filesystem::recursive_directory_iterator&, boost::system::error_code*)
>>> referenced by directory.hpp:500 (/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/directory.hpp:500)
>>>               lto.tmp:(boost::filesystem::recursive_directory_iterator::increment(boost::system::error_code&))
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
```
I did some research and this problem might occur when the libraries are not for the right architecture. I double checked and I installed all libraries. How can I solve this problem?
title: Undefined Symbol when Compiling although specified Libraries
